name: Chicken sword
description:
Controls:

  • Arrows to move
  • up to jump

Notes:

I'm really proud to participate to this jam as it is a first for me. I really enjoyed making this game and I hope you will enjoy playing it too. 

This game has been created with Game Maker Studio 2.

Thanks to miz for organizing this jam

Thanks to megabit for the awesome music https://m.soundcloud.com/megabitemusic/star-hero?in=megabitemusic/sets/meteor-ru...
